Reviews.name: Paula Coots
Reviews.review: Received the large cutting board as a gift! I love it and use it every day for cutting, slicing, and chopping. So useful and solid, while being incredibly beautiful. I appreciate it so much.

Reviews.name: Christine Warren
Reviews.review: I am extremely happy with my serving board. It is beautiful, as well as functional. When not in use, it looks lovely on my counter. I highly recommend ARC Woodworking!
